short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A friendly reminder that everyone is just looking for love.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces Gmail email closings ("Thanks", "Best", "Regards", etc) with a reminder that everyone—deep down—just wants to be loved.

This does not edit the actual email. Only you see the change.
